directions: Blend pineapple, water, lime juice, and sugar in a blender until very smooth. Fill 6 tumblers with ice and pour 2 tablespoons vodka into each. Divide pineapple mixture among glasses and stir.
ingredients: 2 cups chopped peeled and cored fresh pineapple (labeled "extra sweet")
title: Pineapple and Lime Cocktails
